FROM alpine:3.8
LABEL maintainer="Stegen Smith <matthsmi@adobe.com>"

RUN apk update && apk add --no-cache bash ca-certificates

COPY ./butler /butler

EXPOSE 8080

ENTRYPOINT ["/butler"]
